Class ShowDevices

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListActivity
      • com.example.treasurehunt.ShowDevices

  • public class ShowDevices
extends ListActivity

    MMNET Team 04

    Project Title: Treasure Hunt

    Class Description: This activity shows a list of real-time scanned BT visible devices. When the user selects a list element, its MAC address is sent back to Bluetooth activity.
